00023 static void ob_quadrupole(const SlaterDet* Q,
00024                           const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00025                           const GaussianAux* X, 
00026                           complex double q[9][3])
00027 {
00028   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z, N=Q->N;
00029   int i,j;
00030   complex double qme;
00031 
00032   for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00033     for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00034       qme = 3*X->rho[i]*X->rho[j]*X->Q;
00035       q[i+j*3][0] += (1.0-1.0/A)* qme;
00036       q[i+j*3][1] += ((1.0-2.0/A)*(1+G1->xi)/2 + 1.0*Z/(A*A))* qme;
00037       q[i+j*3][2] += ((1.0-2.0/A)*(1-G1->xi)/2 + 1.0*N/(A*A))* qme;
00038     }
00039     
00040     qme = X->rho2* X->Q;
00041     q[j+j*3][0] += -(1.0-1.0/A)* qme;
00042     q[j+j*3][1] += -(1.0*Z/(A*A) + (1.0-2.0/A)*(1+G1->xi)/2)* qme;
00043     q[j+j*3][2] += -(1.0*N/(A*A) + (1.0-2.0/A)*(1-G1->xi)/2)* qme;
00044   }
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 static void tb_quadrupole(const SlaterDet* Q,
00049                           const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00050                           const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00051                           const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00052                           complex double q[9][3])
00053 {
00054   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z, N=Q->N;
00055   int i,j;
00056   complex double qme;
00057 
00058   for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00059     for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00060       qme = 3.0*(X13->rho[i]*X24->rho[j]+X13->rho[j]*X24->rho[i])* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00061       q[i+j*3][0] += -1.0/A* qme;
00062       q[i+j*3][1] += (1.0*Z/(A*A) -1.0/A*((1+G1->xi)/2+(1+G2->xi)/2))* qme;
00063       q[i+j*3][2] += (1.0*N/(A*A) -1.0/A*((1-G1->xi)/2+(1-G2->xi)/2))* qme;
00064     }
00065 
00066     qme = 2.0* cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00067     q[j+j*3][0] += 1.0/A* qme;
00068     q[j+j*3][1] += -(1.0*Z/(A*A) - 1.0/A*((1+G1->xi)/2+(1+G2->xi)/2))* qme;
00069     q[j+j*3][2] += -(1.0*N/(A*A) - 1.0/A*((1-G1->xi)/2+(1-G2->xi)/2))* qme;
00070   }
00071 }
00072 
00073 #define SQR(x) (x)*(x)
00074 
00075 static double det(double R[3][3])
00076 {
00077   return (R[0][0]*R[1][1]*R[2][2] + R[0][1]*R[1][2]*R[2][0] + 
00078           R[0][2]*R[1][0]*R[2][1] - R[0][0]*R[1][2]*R[2][1] - 
00079           R[0][1]*R[1][0]*R[2][2] - R[0][2]*R[1][1]*R[2][0]);
00080 }

00082 
00083 void calcQuadrupole(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00084                     double beta[3], double gamma[3])
00085 {
00086   double qone[9][3], qtwo[9][3], q[9], qsq, detq;
00087   int i,j;
00088 
00089   OneBodyOperator op_ob_quadrupole = {dim: 27, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_quadrupole};
00090   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_quadrupole = {dim: 27, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_quadrupole};
00091 
00092   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_quadrupole, qone);
00093   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_quadrupole, qtwo);
00094 
00095   for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00096     qsq = 0.0;
00097     for (i=0; i<9; i++) {
00098       q[i] = qone[i][j] + qtwo[i][j];
00099       // q[i] = qone[i][j];
00100       qsq += SQR(q[i]);
00101     }
00102     detq = det(q);
00103 
00104     beta[j] = sqrt(5/(24*M_PI)*qsq);
00105     gamma[j] = 60/M_PI*acos(5*sqrt(5)/(16*pow(M_PI,1.5))*detq/pow(beta[j],3));
00106   }
00107 }

00109 
00110 void calcQuadrupolePrime(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00111                          double beta[3])
00112 {
00113   double qone[9][3], qtwo[9][3], q[9], qsq, detq;
00114   double r2[3];
00115   int i,j;
00116 
00117   calcRadii2(Q, X, &r2[0], &r2[1], &r2[2]);
00118   
00119   OneBodyOperator op_ob_quadrupole = {dim: 27, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_quadrupole};
00120   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_quadrupole = {dim: 27, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_quadrupole};
00121 
00122   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_quadrupole, qone);
00123   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_quadrupole, qtwo);
00124 
00125   for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00126     qsq = 0.0;
00127     for (i=0; i<9; i++) {
00128       q[i] = qone[i][j] + qtwo[i][j];
00129       // q[i] = qone[i][j];
00130       qsq += SQR(q[i]);
00131     }
00132     detq = det(q);
00133 
00134     beta[j] = sqrt(2*M_PI/15*qsq)/r2[j];
00135   }
00136   beta[0] /= Q->A;
00137   beta[1] /= Q->Z;
00138   beta[2] /= Q->N;
00139 
00140 }
